Title: The Thing About Heroes
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), John Dove, Gwen Sigan (story editor), Kinan Copen (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: Anonymous A Muslim patrol officer is suspected of causing a van to explode during a Chicago street festival when he goes missing and evidence points to his being involved.
